SMQ020.label: Smoked at least 100 cigarettes in life
SMQ020.text: These next questions are about cigarette smoking and other tobacco use. {Have you/Has SP} smoked at least 100 cigarettes in {your/his/her} entire life?
SMQ020.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMD030.label: Age started smoking cigarettes regularly
SMD030.text: How old {were you/was SP} when {you/s/he} first started to smoke cigarettes fairly regularly?
SMD030.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ040.label: Do you now smoke cigarettes?
SMQ040.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ050Q.label: How long since quit smoking cigarettes
SMQ050Q.text: How long has it been since {you/SP} quit smoking cigarettes?
SMQ050Q.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ050U.label: Unit of measure (day/week/month/year)
SMQ050U.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMD057.label: # cigarettes smoked per day when quit
SMD057.text: At that time, about how many cigarettes did {you/SP} usually smoke per day?
SMD057.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ078.label: How soon after waking do you smoke
SMQ078.text: How soon after you wake up do you smoke? Would you say...
SMQ078.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

3.description: From more than 30 minutes to one hour

4.description: From more than 1 hour to 2 hours

5.description: From more than 2 hours to 3 hours

6.description: From more than 3 hours to 4 hours

SMD641.label: # days smoked cigs during past 30 days
SMD641.text: On how many of the past 30 days did {you/SP} smoke a cigarette?
SMD641.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMD650.label: Avg # cigarettes/day during past 30 days
SMD650.text: During the past 30 days, on the days that {you/SP} smoked, about how many cigarettes did {you/s/he} smoke per day?
SMD650.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMD100FL.label: Cigarette Filter type
SMD100FL.text: Do you usually smoke filtered or non-filtered cigarettes?
SMD100FL.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMD100MN.label: Cigarette Menthol indicator
SMD100MN.text: Do you usually smoke menthol or non-menthol cigarettes?
SMD100MN.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ670.label: Tried to quit smoking
SMQ670.text: During the past 12 months, {have you/has SP} stopped smoking for longer than a day because {you were/he was/she was} trying to quit smoking?
SMQ670.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

SMQ621.label: Cigarettes smoked in entire life
SMQ621.text: The following questions are about cigarette smoking and other tobacco use. Do not include cigars or marijuana. About how many cigarettes have you smoked in your entire life?
SMQ621.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

1.description: I have never smoked, not even a puff

2.description: 1 or more puffs but never a whole cigarette

SMD630.label: Age first smoked whole cigarette
SMD630.text: How old were you when you smoked a whole cigarette for the first time?
SMD630.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS
